description:
Falsely branded as fugitives, Goro`s group forms a new alliance with Honoka and Chika. They use Mitsuko`s power to leap through space and escape Keita`s attack, but a navigational blunder on Mitsuko`s part leads them to a surprise acquaintance of Keita`s.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You Took a Trip, Where Would You Want to Go?
旅行行くならどこ行きたい?
